snippet: An ultra-Orthodox demonstration in Jerusalem drew outrage after young boys wore yellow stars and striped prison camp uniforms.
abstract: Mainstream Israeli leaders denounce ultra-Orthodox protesters in Jerusalem who put young boys on display wearing yellow stars and striped prison camp uniforms; say demonstration insults the memory of victims of the Holocaust; many Israelis religious tensions as a battle over democratic values and the future character of the country.
lead_paragraph: An ultra-Orthodox demonstration in Jerusalem drew outrage after young boys wore yellow stars and striped prison camp uniforms.

headline.seo: Holocaust Images in Ultra-Orthodox Protest Anger Israeli Leaders
headline.main: Israeli Protest’s Invocation of Holocaust Is Condemned
headline.print_headline: Israeli Protest’s Invocation Of Holocaust Is Condemned
